snippet: Joe Arpaio, a sheriff in Arizona, has used headline-grabbing tactics to become a hero to many Americans, but he is on trial over his treatment of Latinos.
abstract: Headline-grabbing tactics and incendiary public comments have come back to haunt Joe Arpaio, sheriff of Maricopa County, Ariz, who has taken the stand in a class-action lawsuit; Arpaio is accused of singling out Latinos, regardless of citizenship or immigration status, for stops, questioning and detention during large-scale policing operations.
lead_paragraph: Joe Arpaio, a sheriff in Arizona, has used headline-grabbing tactics to become a hero to many Americans, but he is on trial over his treatment of Latinos.

headline.seo: Arpaio’s Fondness for Publicity May Bite Back
headline.main: When a Taste for Publicity Bites Back
